short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Astra Vision is an AI-powered web extension integrating a suite of powerful AI tools: Astra Guard and AI Snapper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AstraAI Vision is an extension split into two functionalities - Guard and AI Snipper.

Guard blocks access to known phishing websites in order to protect usersâ€™ Web3 Wallets.

AI Snipper lets users snip a part of their screen and lets users enter a prompt about how it should be analyzed by AI. 

Use cases of this feature are limitless and highly varied, with the possibility to analyze charts of financial assets, find the best chess moves on the board, solve complex mathematical equations, and much more.
